# init(handler:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new map button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(handler: ((CPMapButton) -> Void)? = nil)
```

## Parameters

- **handler**: The block invoked after the user taps the map button.

## Return Value

A newly initialized map button.
title: init(handler:)
